400.title: Bad Request
400.message: The server could not understand your request.

401.title: Unauthorized
401.message: You need to be logged in to access this resource.

403.title: Forbidden
403.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

404.title: Not Found
404.message: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

408.title: Request Timeout
408.message: The server took too long to respond.

429.title: Too Many Requests
429.message: You've made too many requests. Please try again later.

500.title: Internal Server Error
500.message: Something went wrong on our end. Please try again later.

503.title: Service Unavailable
503.message: The service is temporarily down for maintenance.

504.title: Gateway Timeout
504.message: The server is taking too long to respond.

offline.title: Offline
offline.message: You appear to be offline. Please check your internet connection.

connection_failed.title: Connection Failed
connection_failed.message: Failed to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection.

timeout.title: Request Timeout
timeout.message: The request timed out. Please try again.

slow_connection.title: Slow Connection
slow_connection.message: Your connection seems to be slow. Some features may not work properly.

invalid_email.title: Invalid Email
invalid_email.message: Please enter a valid email address.

invalid_phone.title: Invalid Phone Number
invalid_phone.message: Please enter a valid phone number.

weak_password.title: Weak Password
weak_password.message: Password is too weak. Please choose a stronger password.

file_too_large.title: File Too Large
file_too_large.message: The file is too large. Please choose a smaller file.

invalid_file_type.title: Invalid File Type
invalid_file_type.message: This file type is not allowed.

invalid_credentials.title: Invalid Credentials
invalid_credentials.message: The email or password you entered is incorrect.

account_locked.title: Account Locked
account_locked.message: Your account has been locked. Please contact support.

unverified_email.title: Unverified Email
unverified_email.message: Please verify your email address to continue.

session_expired.title: Session Expired
session_expired.message: Your session has expired. Please log in again.

access_denied.title: Access Denied
access_denied.message: You don't have permission to access this resource.

oauth_failed.title: OAuth Failed
oauth_failed.message: Failed to authenticate with the selected provider.

not_authenticated.title: Not Authenticated
not_authenticated.message: You need to be logged in to access this resource.

admin_access_required.title: Admin Access Required
admin_access_required.message: You need administrator privileges to access this resource.

not_authorized.title: Not Authorized
not_authorized.message: You don't have permission to perform this action.

connection_failed.title: Database Connection Failed
connection_failed.message: Failed to connect to the database. Please try again later.

query_failed.title: Query Failed
query_failed.message: Failed to execute the database query.

database_error.title: Database Error
database_error.message: A database error occurred. Please try again later.

server_error.title: Server Error
server_error.message: An internal server error occurred. Please try again later.

fetch_failed.title: Fetch Failed
fetch_failed.message: Failed to fetch {{resource}}. Please try again later.

create_failed.title: Create Failed
create_failed.message: Failed to create {{resource}}. Please try again.

update_failed.title: Update Failed
update_failed.message: Failed to update {{resource}}. Please try again.

delete_failed.title: Delete Failed
delete_failed.message: Failed to delete {{resource}}. Please try again.

not_found.title: File Not Found
not_found.message: The requested file could not be found.

upload_failed.title: Upload Failed
upload_failed.message: Failed to upload the file. Please try again.

download_failed.title: Download Failed
download_failed.message: Failed to download the file. Please try again.

corrupted.title: Corrupted File
corrupted.message: The file appears to be corrupted.

payment_failed.title: Payment Failed
payment_failed.message: Your payment could not be processed. Please try again.

card_declined.title: Card Declined
card_declined.message: Your card was declined. Please try another payment method.

insufficient_funds.title: Insufficient Funds
insufficient_funds.message: You don't have sufficient funds for this transaction.

invalid_card.title: Invalid Card
invalid_card.message: The card information you entered is invalid.

invalid_request.title: Invalid Request
invalid_request.message: The request was invalid or malformed.

permission_denied.title: Permission Denied
permission_denied.message: You don't have permission to perform this action.

resource_not_found.title: Resource Not Found
resource_not_found.message: The requested resource could not be found.

rate_limit_exceeded.title: Rate Limit Exceeded
rate_limit_exceeded.message: You've made too many requests. Please try again later.

maintenance_mode.title: Maintenance Mode
maintenance_mode.message: The site is currently under maintenance. Please try again later.
